RT @absurdistwords: For anyone who thinks this is normal I invite you to look at past posts of the FBI account and compare subject matter o‚Ä¶

RT @absurdistwords: MOST of this stuff is directly related to issues raised in this campaign.

This is not accidental
RT @absurdistwords: If this were an account merely posting interesting public records that would be one thing, but to start now?
RT @absurdistwords: That more than one of this last batch refer to the candidates in this election is incredibly suspicious given the Hatch‚Ä¶
RT @absurdistwords: Previously it just seemed to release FOIA-released documents of general interest. Mostly on deceased public figures
RT @absurdistwords: It seems to be disseminating information related to both candidates, #Comey, FBI recordkeeping policy and protests
RT @absurdistwords: I thought perhaps it was a satire account, but it seems not to be by all inspection

RT @absurdistwords: It only HAS 131 tweets in total. But now is churning out election-related information.

What the hell IS this? https://‚Ä¶
RT @absurdistwords: In the past 2 days it has tweeted more information than in the entire latter half of 2015
RT @absurdistwords: The FBI account is Twitter verified and previous to this week it tweeted once or twice a month, and not in a year
RT @absurdistwords: This FBI account has been dormant since fall of 2015 and just began tweeting two days ago. https://t.co/eWGc7tnJpX

posts.title: Experiments With Live Looping Performance
posts.dek: In which we delve into the artistry of live looping, illuminating the core concepts and essential gear that enable musicians to create immersive soundscapes on the fly

posts.title: Joy Driven Development
posts.dek: In which we use joy and curiosity as fuel to propel us forward

posts.title: The Art Of Coding
posts.dek: In which we go into detail about how to write code to accomplish a goal
